评论详情: Only top. No pants.  Picture shows a suit.

Bought this jacket for work. Ordered size 12 thinking it ran small but too large. Easily returned at my UPS store and was quickly refunded. Ordered a 10 and fits perfectly over a blouse. Had to have sleeves altered 1/2” shorter. Gorgeous jacket and great price!  I looked everywhere. I love Calvin Klein!
Me encanta además la calidad es excelente! Lo ame!

I have been searching for the THE plaid blazer for a few years and this is it. Size 2 feels tailored, and the fabric is beautiful. A true classic cut and pattern that is always in style, I know that it will be in my closet for many years to come.
